name: Shineco, Inc.
description: Shineco, Inc. is a leading provider of agricultural and health-related products, primarily focusing on the cultivation, processing, and distribution of traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) and natural health products. Founded in 1999, Shineco operates with the vision of promoting healthier lifestyles through natural and organic products. The company specializes in the production of various herbal extracts, dietary supplements, and other health-related items that are derived from traditional Chinese herbal remedies. Shineco is also involved in the development of advanced agricultural technologies to enhance crop yields and sustainability in farming practices. By leveraging modern biotechnology and traditional knowledge, the company aims to improve the efficiency and quality of TCM products. Shineco is committed to environmental sustainability and aims to reduce the ecological footprint of its operations. The company has established a strong distribution network in China and is expanding its reach internationally, catering to the growing demand for natural health solutions. Shineco’s mission is to become a global leader in the health and wellness sector, providing high-quality products that promote overall well-being.

seo.meta_title: Shineco, Inc. | Natural Health and Agricultural Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Shineco, Inc., a leader in agricultural and health-related products focusing on traditional Chinese medicine and organic solutions. Learn about our commitment to sustainable practices.

faq.question: What does Shineco specialize in?
faq.answer: Shineco specializes in the cultivation, processing, and distribution of traditional Chinese medicine and natural health products.

faq.question: Where is Shineco headquartered?
faq.answer: Shineco is headquartered in Beijing, China.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Shineco?
faq.answer: Ning Wu is the CEO of Shineco, Inc.

faq.question: What types of products does Shineco offer?
faq.answer: Shineco offers herbal extracts, dietary supplements, and organic agricultural products.
